subject: Baseball
Steroids
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Mitchell report threw a huge changeup to casual fans for whom the steroid era simply meant Barry Bonds. Now they had a big-time pitcher to go along with a home run slugger.
snippet: The Mitchell report threw a huge changeup to casual fans for whom the steroid era simply meant Barry Bonds. Now they had a big-time pitcher to go along with a home run slugger.
